frontmatter.title: My 30-Day Song Challenge Answers, Combined. — Part-II
frontmatter.description: I came across an amusing challenge while browsing social media a while ago, which was to identify a song based on themes/scenarios every day for one month. Here's my take.

frontmatter.title: Ashish Nehra - A Legend?
frontmatter.description: Is Ashish Nehra just the sum of his performances on the field? Is it justified to remember his as an injury-ridden career of no consequence? My two cents as NehraJi announces his retirement from the game.
